text: The 2019–20 season was Al-Wehda's 36th non-consecutive season in the top flight of Saudi football and 75th year in existence as a football club. The club participated in the Pro League and the King Cup. The season covered the period from 1 July 2019 to 9 September 2020. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers and loans== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
